UserQuestion.title: UserQuestion
UserQuestion.description: Plain text string containing the userâ€™s original question that the agent could not answer. Retrieved from the end-user conversation in Agentforce when a query is detected as out of scope. Expected format: unformatted sentence(s) of user input.

userEmail.title: userEmail
userEmail.description: This will capture the email of the user whose query has not been answered by the agent.
